panel__settings__advanced__logging__titl.message: Enables console logging for the extension.

panel__settings__advanced__logging__subh.message: This is an advanced settings, it is purely technical and does not impact features.

panel__settings__advanced__logging__leve.message: The cumulative level of logging for the background script (defaults to error).
The cumulative level of logging for the popup (defaults to error).
The cumulative level of logging for the option page (defaults to error).
The cumulative level of logging for the content script (defaults to error).
The cumulative level of logging for the standalone app (defaults to error).

panel__settings__advanced__logging__hist.message:
The maximum number of lines to keep in memory.
 Note that too many line might impact performance.
